constant.name: desc
constant.default: This is test file for klanfSmarty extension. This is small extension which add multilanguage support to Smarty.
constant.translation: This is test file for klanfSmarty extension. This is small extension which add multilanguage support to Smarty.
Ovo je testni file za slangSmarty ekstenziju. Ona daje vrlo efikasni support za visejezicne siteove.
